channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Down More Than 30% This Year, Could This Struggling Artificial Intelligence Stock Be a Bargain Buy Right Now?
Justices side with Texas death row inmate seeking DNA testing to show he shouldn't be executed
Thai teen says he threw himself out of a window to escape Cambodia’s brutal scam farms
Neighbour beat ‘much-loved’ father to death in row over shutting a gate
India says defence gathering in China unable to adopt joint statement
Justices side with Texas death row inmate seeking DNA testing to show he shouldn't be executed
item.description: The Supreme Court has ruled for a Texas death row inmate who's seeking DNA testing to show he should be ineligible for execution

item.title: Pentagon leaders double down on the destruction from US attacks on Iran
item.description: The Pentagon’s top leaders have doubled down on how destructive the U.S. attacks had been on Iran's nuclear facilities

item.title: More refunds are being sent to Fortnite players 'tricked' into unwanted purchases. How you can apply
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission is issuing more refunds to Fortnite players who it says were charged for unwanted purchases

item.title: Young leaders advancing potential climate solutions could win $1 million grants
item.description: Youth-led climate groups are getting a $25 million injection from a funding collaborative

item.title: Prosecutor casts Sean 'Diddy' Combs as a criminal who abused others through power, violence and fear
item.description: A prosecutor has begun two days of closing arguments at Sean “Diddy” Combs' sex trafficking trial by telling a jury that the music mogul used “power, ...
